kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://petstore.swagger.io/v2, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: DELETE On Session
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/999 path_url=/v2/pet/999 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
